_description: Gospel for Friday after Fourth Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Ihesu crist and his desciples dereWent obout both fer and nere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þan herby may men wit full weleþat payne of dede es fell to fele
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Erat quidam languens lazarus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi Secundum Iohannem de lazaro (rubric, f. 60ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.128-136.
